import React,{useState} from 'react' import Nav from './Nav' import {Taka,Stars} from "./Components" import Navigation from './Navigation-ash' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' const Reviewer = () => { let location = useLocation() let data = location.state let url2 = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' let [star,setStar] = useState(0) let [writing,setWriting]=useState('') let [img,setImg]=useState() console.log(data) console.log(star) return (

{data.name}

{data.story}

setWriting(e.target.value)} value={writing} placeholder="Write your own review" type="text" className="rev">
{setImg(e.target.files[0])}} type="file">
) } export default Reviewer
